mapper.sql: a.document_no AS "documentNo", a.item_no AS "itemNo", a.drug_code AS "drugCode", a.drug_spec AS "drugSpec", a.units AS "units", a.batch_no AS "batchNo", a.expire_date AS "expireDate", a.firm_id AS "firmId", a.purchase_price AS "purchasePrice", a.discount AS "discount", a.retail_price AS "retailPrice", a.package_spec AS "packageSpec", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.package_units AS "packageUnits", a.sub_package_1 AS "subPackage1", a.sub_package_units_1 AS "subPackageUnits1", a.sub_package_spec_1 AS "subPackageSpec1", a.sub_package_2 AS "subPackage2", a.sub_package_units_2 AS "subPackageUnits2", a.sub_package_spec_2 AS "subPackageSpec2", a.invoice_no AS "invoiceNo", a.invoice_date AS "invoiceDate", a.trade_price AS "tradePrice", a.inventory AS "inventory", a.memo AS "memo", a.order_batch AS "orderBatch", a.voucher_no AS "voucherNo", a.tender_no AS "tenderNo", a.invoice_sign AS "invoiceSign", a.origin AS "origin", a.production_date AS "productionDate", a.produce_date AS "produceDate", a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drug_import_detail( document_no, item_no, drug_code, drug_spec, units, batch_no, expire_date, firm_id, purchase_price, discount, retail_price, package_spec, quantity, package_units, sub_package_1, sub_package_units_1, sub_package_spec_1, sub_package_2, sub_package_units_2, sub_package_spec_2, invoice_no, invoice_date, trade_price, inventory, memo, order_batch, voucher_no, tender_no, invoice_sign, origin, production_date, produce_date, id, org_id, remarks, update_by, create_by, update_date, del_flag, create_date ) VALUES ( #{documentNo}, #{itemNo}, #{drugCode}, #{drugSpec}, #{units}, #{batchNo}, #{expireDate}, #{firmId}, #{purchasePrice}, #{discount}, #{retailPrice}, #{packageSpec}, #{quantity}, #{packageUnits}, #{subPackage1}, #{subPackageUnits1}, #{subPackageSpec1}, #{subPackage2}, #{subPackageUnits2}, #{subPackageSpec2}, #{invoiceNo}, #{invoiceDate}, #{tradePrice}, #{inventory}, #{memo}, #{orderBatch}, #{voucherNo}, #{tenderNo}, #{invoiceSign}, #{origin}, #{productionDate}, #{produceDate}, #{id}, #{orgId}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE drug_import_detail SET document_no = #{documentNo}, item_no = #{itemNo}, drug_code = #{drugCode}, drug_spec = #{drugSpec}, units = #{units}, batch_no = #{batchNo}, expire_date = #{expireDate}, firm_id = #{firmId}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice}, discount = #{discount}, retail_price = #{retailPrice}, package_spec = #{packageSpec}, quantity = #{quantity}, package_units = #{packageUnits}, sub_package_1 = #{subPackage1}, sub_package_units_1 = #{subPackageUnits1}, sub_package_spec_1 = #{subPackageSpec1}, sub_package_2 = #{subPackage2}, sub_package_units_2 = #{subPackageUnits2}, sub_package_spec_2 = #{subPackageSpec2}, invoice_no = #{invoiceNo}, invoice_date = #{invoiceDate}, trade_price = #{tradePrice}, inventory = #{inventory}, memo = #{memo}, order_batch = #{orderBatch}, voucher_no = #{voucherNo}, tender_no = #{tenderNo}, invoice_sign = #{invoiceSign}, origin = #{origin}, production_date = #{productionDate}, produce_date = #{produceDate}, org_id = #{orgId}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
